channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Central management console)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Central management console)

item.title: CVE-2023-0018|2024-08-02T04:54:32.580Z -- sap -- businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28central%20management%20console%29
item.description: Due to improper input sanitization of user-controlled input in SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform CMC application - versions 420, and 430, an attacker with basic user-level privileges can modify/upload crystal reports containing a malicious payload. Once these reports are viewable, anyone who opens those reports would be susceptible to stored XSS attacks. As a result of the attack, information maintained in the victim's web browser can be read, modified, and sent to the attacker.
